EmailTemplate.name: 06-20-22 RET Freshop Webinar Invite email 2.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: WEBINAR: Join NCR, Progressive Grocer, Sedano’s & Sendik’s for eCommerce Insights
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Food retailing in today’s world means offering a great customer experience — whether in-store or online. Being a current user of NCR Freshop means you’re ahead of the eCommerce game. Join us on June 22nd at 11am ET where we’ll provide powerful shopper insights changing the grocery technology landscape forever, including: - How to drive major sales through an airtight online merchandising strategy - The importance of marketing through your e-commerce platform (and how to do it well) - The essential things to look for in a scalable, future-flexible e-commerce solution You’ll hear about all this and more in our upcoming, trend-packed webinar. We hope to see you there! ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
